::Slayer::

Slayer calmly looks at Prebon. The bot was his master, but fear was 
not a common emotion in him.

"I was retreating, Master, but he grabbed on to me. I got him off me 
and we agreed to a draw. I retreated as you ordered in the end."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Correct me if I'm wrong, which of course I am not, I do not 
remember
> ordering you to engage any wolf."Prebon was starting to develope a 
sarcastic
> nature with the wolf. "You were ordered to retreat, you failed to 
obey, if I
> let you get away with it then I lose respect. "His voice rose to 
near
> shouting levels, "Can you give me one good reason to accept your 
failure?"
> Face to face with Slayer, Prebon showed no fear or leanience toward 
the
> wolf. "You engaged another wolf, was he destroyed, or did you fail 
in tha
